description.text: A rot warden can channel stored spell energy into specific spells he hasn't prepared ahead of time. He can â€œlose"a prepared spell in order to cast the following spells at the indicated levels: 1st--decompose corpse, 2nd--warp wood, 3rd--fungal infestation, 4th--explosion of rot, 5th--insect plague, 6th--swarm skin, 7th--creeping doom, 8th--horrid wilting, 9th--massacre.
